attributes.action: ensure that Shimon Peres is stripped of his honorary knighthood,
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
When awarded his honorary knighthood by HM The Queen Elizabeth II, Shimon Peres stated that it was an honour for the state of Israel.

Shimon Peres, President of Israel, is presiding over a humanitarian crisis. His government and military are committing war crimes under international law. 

Stripping Shimon Peres of his knighthood would show that the British people believe that the President of a country committing war crimes is not worthy of such an honour.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
